actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider makes two longbow attacks or two claws attacks.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Longbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) piercing damage.

special_abilities.name: Deadly Precision
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider's ranged attacks do an extra 9 (2d8) damage (included below).

special_abilities.name: Evasive
special_abilities.desc: Ranged weapon attacks against the tosculi elite bow raider have disadvantage.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Skirmisher
special_abilities.desc: The tosculi elite bow raider can Dash as a bonus action.
